articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google announces massive expansion of AI features in Chrome - Ars Technica
articles.description: Chrome’s future as an AI browser starts today.

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google now lets you share your custom Gemini AI assistants known as Gems - TechCrunch
articles.description: The feature launched last year, initially as part of the Gemini Advanced paid subscription, allowing users to write instructions to create an AI chatbot for different scenarios.
articles.content: Google is making it possible to now share your Gemini Gems — custom AI assistants and experts designed for specific tasks — the company announced on Thursday. The feature launched last year, initiall… [+1488 chars]
